data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Belokobylskij, Sergey A., Derafshan, Hossein Ali, Rakhshani, Ehsan (2018): Revision of the genus Hoplocrotaphus Telenga, 1950 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Opiinae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 62: 55-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.62.21858, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.62.21858
